title: Getting 3 FPS in-game after 6.11 patch
body: Played fine until now got into game ready to try out Zed because he is free this week and boom can barely leave fountain  Before I get 3 fps. I set all settings to low and tried still only like 5 fps.Reinstalled still 3 FPS. Tried on my OCE account still 3 FPS same PC.

replies.body:
Hmmm...it sounds like there might be some sort of hardware/software issue at play here.  Given that it happens the moment you get into the game and stays that way, make sure to complete all of the steps in our [FPS Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684).  It has the most common solutions that should get your FPS back to what it normally is.

Let me know if you continue to have issues!
Dont know what worked but it worked im getting higher fps than before now thank u so much.
